jd: Hi We have an Immediate Position of Business Analyst-IV position- Madison, WI needs to relocate please let me know Interest Business Analyst-IV position Location: Madison, WI needs to relocate Top Skills & Years of Experience:• 10+ years of experience with business systems analysis.• 10+ years of experience documenting complex business and software systems.• Demonstrated communication experience, working with business and technical teams.• Demonstrated Experience working in Agile, Waterfall and/or Hybrid methodologies.Nice to Have Skills:• Familiarity with source code repository tools to aid in discovery of interfaces utilized by web application systems.• Tech Writing, with an emphasis on communicating between the business and technical needs of a cross functional project team.• Ability to understand, update and create process diagrams in Visio.• Experience helping with Agile transformation.The most qualified candidate will also demonstrate experience in one or more of the following areas:• WebSphere• GIT• Experience creating and maintaining architecture diagrams.• Web application development experience in Java or .NET.• Web service development experience SOAP and/or REST.• GIS analysis and development experience.
